Package camzup.pfriendly

Class Convert

java.lang.Object
camzup.pfriendly.Convert
public abstract class Convert extends Object
Facilitates conversions between core objects and Processing objects.

  • Method Details

    • toCurveEntity2

      public static CurveEntity2 toCurveEntity2(processing.core.PShape source, CurveEntity2 target)
      Converts a 2D PShape to a curve entity. Support for this conversion is very limited; its primary target is PShapes created from importing an SVG. For best results, use a PShape consisting of quadratic and cubic Bezier curves.
      Parameters:
      source - the source shape
      target - the target curve entity
      Returns:
      the curve entity
      See Also:
      • CurveEntity2.reset()
      • CurveEntity2.appendAll(java.util.Collection)
      • toCurve2(PShape, ArrayList)

      target - the target matrix
      Returns:

      public static MeshEntity3 toMeshEntity3(processing.core.PShape source, MeshEntity3 target)

      target - the target curve entity
      Returns:
      the mesh entity

    • toPShape

      public static processing.core.PShape toPShape(processing.core.PGraphics rndr, Curve2 source)
      Converts a 2D curve to a PShape. Returns a PConstants.PATH.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source mesh
      Returns:
      the PShape

    • toPShape

      public static processing.core.PShape toPShape(processing.core.PGraphics rndr, CurveEntity2 source)
      Converts a 2D curve entity to a PShape. The entity's transform is converted to a matrix which is applied to the shape.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source entity
      Returns:
      the PShape
      See Also:
      • toPShape(PGraphics, Curve2)
      • toPMatrix2D(Transform2, TransformOrder, PMatrix2D)

    • toPShape

      public static processing.core.PShape toPShape(processing.core.PGraphics rndr, Mesh2 source)
      Converts a 2D mesh to a PShape. Returns a PConstants.GROUP which contains, as a child, each face of the source mesh. Each child is of the type PShape.PATH. Child shapes record only 2D coordinates, not texture coordinates.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source mesh
      Returns:
      the PShape

    • toPShape

      public static processing.core.PShape toPShape(processing.core.PGraphics rndr, MeshEntity2 source)
      Converts a 2D mesh entity to a PShape. The entity's transform is converted to a matrix which is applied to the shape.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source entity
      Returns:
      the PShape

    • toPShape

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShape(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, Curve2 source)
      Converts a 2D curve to a PShape. Returns PShape.GEOMETRY.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source mesh
      Returns:
      the PShape

    • toPShape

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShape(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, Curve3 source)

      Parameters:

    • toPShape

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShape(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, CurveEntity2 source)
      Converts a 2D curve entity to a PShapeOpenGL. Requires a PGraphicsOpenGL renderer. The entity's transform is converted to a matrix which is applied to the shape.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source entity
      Returns:
      the PShape

    • toPShape

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShape(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, CurveEntity3 source)
      Converts a 3D curve entity to a PShapeOpenGL. Requires a PGraphicsOpenGL renderer. The entity's transform is converted to a matrix which is applied to the shape.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source entity
      Returns:
      the PShape

    • toPShape

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShape(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, Mesh2 source)
      Converts a 2D mesh to a PShape. Audits the mesh to see if all of its faces have the same number of vertices. Meshes composed entirely of triangles or quadrilaterals create much more efficient PShapes than those with n-sided polygons.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source mesh
      Returns:
      the PShape
      See Also:
      • Mesh.auditFaceType(Mesh)

    • toPShape

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShape(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, Mesh3 source)
      Converts a 3D mesh to a PShape. Audits the mesh to see if all of its faces have the same number of vertices. Meshes composed entirely of triangles or quadrilaterals create much more efficient PShapes than those with ngons.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source mesh
      Returns:
      the PShape
      See Also:
      • Mesh.auditFaceType(Mesh)

    • toPShape

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShape(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, MeshEntity2 source)
      Converts a 2D mesh entity to a PShapeOpenGL. Requires a PGraphicsOpenGL renderer. The entity's transform is converted to a matrix which is applied to the shape.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source entity
      Returns:
      the PShape

    • toPShape

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShape(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, MeshEntity3 source)
      Converts a 3D mesh entity to a PShapeOpenGL. Requires a PGraphicsOpenGL renderer. The entity's transform is converted to a matrix which is applied to the shape.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source entity
      Returns:
      the PShape

    • toPShapeNonUniform

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShapeNonUniform(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, Mesh2 source)
      Converts a 2D mesh to a PShape. Returns a PConstants.GROUP which contains, as a child, each face of the source mesh. Each child is of the type PShape.GEOMETRY. Child shapes record coordinates and texture coordinates.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source mesh
      Returns:
      the PShape

    • toPShapeNonUniform

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShapeNonUniform(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, Mesh3 source)
      Converts a 3D mesh to a PShape. Returns a PConstants.GROUP which contains, as a child, each face of the source mesh. Each child is of the type PShape.GEOMETRY. Child shapes record coordinates, texture coordinates and normals.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source mesh
      Returns:
      the PShape

    • toPShapeUniform

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShapeUniform(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, Mesh2 source, int shapeCode)
      Converts a 2D mesh with a uniform number of vertices per face to a PShape. Acceptable face types are PConstants.TRIANGLES (9) and PConstants.QUADS (17).
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source mesh
      shapeCode - the Processing shape code
      Returns:
      the shape

    • toPShapeUniform

      public static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL toPShapeUniform(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, Mesh3 source, int shapeCode)
      Converts a 3D mesh with a uniform number of vertices per face to a PShape. Acceptable face types are PConstants.TRIANGLES (9) and PConstants.QUADS (17).
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      source - the source mesh
      shapeCode - the Processing shape code
      Returns:
      the shape

    • toVec4

      public static Vec4 toVec4(processing.core.PVector source, Vec4 target)
      Converts from a PVector to a Vec4. The w component is assumed to be zero.
      Parameters:
      source - the source vector
      target - the target vector
      Returns:
      the vector
